page.title: 08QUESTIONAIRE *MASTER COPY*
page.content: St Thomas More Comprehensive School ===================================== DOMESDAY PROJECT ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Has your family always lived in the village ? -----------------|-------------------- NO | YES -----------------|-------------------- What area did you| How long has your come from? | family lived in the | village? -------------------------------------- | -----------------|-------------------- Why did you come | Why did you stay here ? | here? WORK| SOCIAL| FAMILY | WORK | SOCIAL | | | | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ PARENTS : : UNCLES/AUNTS : : BROTHERS/SISTERS : : OTHERS : :
